::DrillBit::

He shoots the grenades, with his gattaling gun. He climbs into Star
Scream.
"Lets get out of here."

::Hot Rod::

"No, Feline. I'm find, really. I feel alot better than I look. I want to
stay in the fight." He opened fire on the Mafia.
